name: The Serum 2.0
about: What it is: A first-step serum that helps maintain the skinu2019s youthful look by promoting one of the keys critical to skin renewal...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Highlighted Ingredients:- Radiant Lily Concentrate: Improves the skinu2019s intuitive ability to repair and defend itself..- Organic Lemon Myrtle Extract: Enhances the skinu2019s ability to generate epidermal cells..- Stabilizing Technology: Immediately restores skin to its normal state and provides intensive care...What Else You Need to Know: This serum gives the skin new radiance, reduces the appearance of fine lines with youthful smoothness, visibly plumps the skin, smooths, and moisturizes the skin thoroughly.
ingredients: -Radiant Lily Concentrate: Improves the skinu2019s intuitive ability to repair and defend itself..-Organic Lemon Myrtle Extract: Enhances the skinu2019s ability to generate epidermal cells..-Stabilizing Technology: Immediately restores skin to its normal state and provides intensive care...Water(Aqua/Eau), Butylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat., Dipropylene Glycol, Peg/Ppg-14/7 Dimethyl Ether, Betaine, Glycerin, Trehalose, Phenoxyethanol, Carbomer, Sodium Citrate, ppg-13-Decyltetradeceth-24, Citric Acid, Erythritol, Fructose, Xanthan Gum, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Allantoin, Fragrance (Parfum), Disodium Edta, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Tremella Fuciformis Polysaccharide, Potassium Hydroxide, Saccharomyces Ferment Lysate Filtrate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, lilium Candidum Bulb Extract, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Extract, Limonene, Linalool, Theanine, Hydrolyzed Silk, Disodium Adenosine Triphosphate, Inositol, Potentilla Erecta Root Extract, Bupleurum Falcatum Root Extract, Polyquaternium-51, Tocopherol, Hydrolyzed Conchiolin Protein.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to the face every morning and evening after cleansing skin and before applying lotion.u200b.-Press the pump three times into palmu200b..-Smooth product gently over your skinu200b.
